com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects

Class Gameboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects.Gameboard

  • public class Gameboard
extends java.lang.Object
    The current state of the game board along with information about game state.
    Author:
    OrbisAccess

      NOTE: This constructor isn't needed for creating an AI.

      • getTeleportLocations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getTeleportLocations()

        Returns all the teleport locations that exist on the game board.

        Every point can be called with point.x to get x and point.y to get y.

        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all teleport locations in points

                         throws MapOutOfBoundsException
        Query a certain coordinate and will return true if bullets exist on the given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate to check
        y - The y-coordinate to check
        Returns:

        MapOutOfBoundsException

      • getTurretAtTile

        public Turret getTurretAtTile(int x,
                              int y)
                       throws NoItemException,
                              MapOutOfBoundsException
        Query a certain coordinate and will return a turret if it exist (throws exception if it doesn't).
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate to check
        y - The y-coordinate to check
        Returns:
        The turret on coordinate (x, y) and throws an exception if it doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        NoItemException - If the turret doesn't exist.
        MapOutOfBoundsException
        See Also:
        Turret
